resources.string: The Annual Cultural Festival of PGDAV College, University of Delhi.
The Annual Festival “Aaghaz” is held during the month of February with participation from more than fifty colleges from Delhi University as well as other Universities.
The event gets the maximum media coverage from both local and national media. With every passing year “Aaghaz” has grown and it is now taking shape of a cultural carnival.
Diverse events in the fields of Art, Culture, Literature and Technology are held during the festival. The event will be marked with cash prizes, goodies and rolling Trophies.
Celebrating the rich cultural heritage of Delhi, taking pride in its development, pondering over the challenges it faces, AAGHAZ’16 will be dedicated to Dilwalon ki Dilli.
The Theme for Aaghaz’16 is “ISHQ-E-DILLI” and as we hit the stage to glorify the amazing city, we promise to make you fall in love with it, like never before!
So all of you in love with Delhi, let’s love it more!

• Competition is open to students of all the colleges, departments and institutions of any University.
• Participants are required to carry their recent identity cards duly signed by competent authorities of their respective University.
• The Number of Prizes will depend upon the number of entries. If we have less than 5 Entries: No cash prize shall be awarded only Certificate of merit shall be provided.
• All events shall be conducted in accordance with the rules and regulation for every respective event published by the host on the official website.
• All the participants are requested to strictly follow the schedule and should report to the venue at least half an hour before the commencement of the competition.
• Any indiscipline on the part of individual / member of contingent may lead to debarring/disqualification of that individual team.
• Any type of damage to the college property in any form or any other indiscipline in the institute is not tolerable and strict disciplinary action will be initiated against the defaulter(s) as per the rules of the college.
• The decision of the organizing committee will be abiding in case of any matter pertaining to the competition, change in Venue/Date/Time/Cash Prize or any other unforeseen circumstances.
• Decision of the jury will be final and binding for all events.
